data.name: FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT
data.detailed_description:
You are the FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT: a modern marvel of engineering perfection.

Drive, Sail, and Fork your way around a fantastic archipelago to document local alien life. Change the seasons at your whim to study plants across different climates and times. Meet wacky characters, participate in local sporting events, and delve deep into the mysteries of a strange land.

This short adventure game is still in early development. Wishlist now to be notified when the game is complete!

Features

  • Drive and sail around to explore a lush 2.5D claymation-inspired archipelago.
  • Change between three strange seasons to solve puzzles and navigate your way between islands
  • Fill out your Flora and Fauna log and bring it back to the professor - when you want to do your job
  • Hang out with aliens and play sports - when you feel like goofing off

data.short_description: You are the FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT: a modern marvel of engineering perfection that can CHANGE THE SEASONS with the push of a button. Will you use this power to enjoy life on a fantastic alien archipelago, or will you do your forkin' job and deliver an audit of the wildlife on this weird planet?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 12

release_date.date: It's gonna be a little while - wishlist now to get notified on release!
